[[col:red]]start with[[/col]]
[[col:red]]Recruit an Arachnarok Spider[[/col]]
Nuthin’ betta for numbin’ pain! Da drunk stunties me bashed for would agree…
Flappy bits n’ hollow bones give dish good crunch!
Got ‘airs stuck on, but still tastier than gobbo meat!
Da fleshy bit’s inside, but me like eat da shell too!
No things more tasty in sea. Except maybe Elf-sailors...
Squeeze anyfink ‘ard enuf, goo’s gonna come out, wever dey want or not!
Most exotic meat of all meat! Nuthin' chewier!
Good for tooth pick, or grind n’ sprinkle in nice stew.
Magic pus makes dish betta! No, me don’t know where came from!
Me not know wot makes dem glow, but dung piles look pretty afterwards!
Sum gitz wot tried ta rob me in Badlands, me bash them, take limbs.
Me used ta keep as pets in me pond, but dey’s too tasty for dat.
Swiped dem from pointy-eared gitz forest. Me bash sum of dem on da way, too
Stoopid Harpies attack me in Troll Country. Dey no flyin’ no more!
No ‘shroom more bitter, dis stickier than a Squig’s bum!
Gamey, but tasty! Only find fresher on pointy-‘eads island.
Skin dem first, make nice belt!
Yea, me milked Centigor. Sweet boy 'e woz...
Worth all da rancid gas you's gonna get!
Big killy bird near ‘ad me but me 'ad it for dinna. Da claws all wot's left!
If you no prepare right, you die. But dat’s wot makes dem tasty!
Dey calls stinky but me think opposite. Me like mash it up n’ rub on meself. Good for skin, you try!
Careful of dem suckas, took months ta pull off da last one wot stuck on me!
Already ‘alf cooked ta stop regeneratin’, you's betta cook ‘til black!
Dis be delicacy ta night gobbos – dem sneaky gitz but knows a good quiche!
